Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Either side of the {? | $(this.trait:button:material) | $(this.trait:cutton color="1") $(this.trait:button:material) $(this.trait:button:type) shaped disks | $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) disks }have been adorned with $(this.trait:bead:color) $(this.trait:bead:material) $(this.trait:bead:type) beads. The beads themselves, arranged one atop the other, to either side, interconnect leaf and disk both via fine $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) pins.

Either side of the {? | $(this.trait:button:material) | $(this.trait:cutton color="1") $(this.trait:button:material) $(this.trait:button:type) shaped disks | $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) disks }have been adorned with $(this.trait:bead:color) $(this.trait:bead:material) $(this.trait:bead:type) shaped beads. The beads themselves, arranged one atop the other, to either side, interconnect leaf and disk both via fine $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) pins.

A series of {? | $(this.trait:button:material) | $(this.trait:button:color) $(this.trait:button:material) $(this.trait:button:type) shaped disks, set between the $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) leaf links, dangle from end to end upon chain of the $(this.trait:brief).| $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) disks, set between matching leaf links, dangle from end to end upon the chain of the $(this.trait:brief).}{? | $(this.trait:gem:material) | Each disk has been centrally set with 10 mm $(this.trait:gem:shape) $(this.trait:gem:color) $(this.trait:gem:material) gems, creating a seemingly endless rope of amulets that circles the throat to the nape.}

A series of {? | $(this.trait:button:material) | $(this.trait:button:color) $(this.trait:button:material) $(this.trait:button:type) shaped disks, set between the $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) leaf links, dangle from end to end upon chain of the $(this.trait:brief).| $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) disks, set between matching leaf links, dangle from end to end upon the chain of the $(this.trait:brief).}{? | $(this.trait:gem:material) | Each disk has been centrally set with 10 mm $(this.trait:gem:shape) $(this.trait:gem:color) $(this.trait:gem:material) gems, creating a seemingly endless rope of amulets that circles the throat to the nape.}
the $(this.trait:gem:color) $(this.trait:gem:material) gems set into the $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) $(this.trait:brief)’s disks

A series of 10 mm $(this.trait:gem:type) $(this.trait:gem:color) $(this.trait:gem:material) gems set into the {? | $(this.trait:button:material) | $(this.trait:button:color) $(this.trait:button:material) $(this.trait:button:type) shaped disks. | $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) $(this.trait:brief)’s disks.}

A series of 10 mm $(this.trait:gem:type) $(this.trait:gem:color) $(this.trait:gem:material) gems set into the {? | $(this.trait:button:material) | $(this.trait:button:color) $(this.trait:button:material) $(this.trait:button:type) shaped disks. | $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) $(this.trait:brief)’s disks.}

Inset into the $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) leaf shaped links, the tiniest of $(this.trait:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:gempieces:material) melee gems glimmer at the slightest movement, lending the leaves the appearance of being adorned with so many $(this.trait:material) dewdrops.

Inset into the $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) leaf shaped links, the tiniest of $(this.trait:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:gempieces:material) melee gems glimmer at the slightest movement, lending the leaves the appearance of being adorned with so many $(this.trait:material) dewdrops.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] An elaborate \$(this.trait:color) \$(this.trait:material) \$(this.trait:brief) with \{? \| \$(this.trait:button:material) \| \$(this.trait:button:type) shaped disk settings, \| \$(this.trait:color) \$(this.trait:material) disks,\}\{? \| \$(this.trait:gem:material) \| each set with a 10 mm \$(this.trait:gem:shape) \$(this.trait:gem:color) \$(this.trait:gem:material). The settings have been\} interspersed with links crafted into the shape of leaves. \{? \| \$(this.trait:bead:material) \| Each \$(this.trait:color) \$(this.trait:material) disk has been festooned at either side with pairs of detailed \$(this.trait:bead:color) \$(this.trait:bead:material) \$(this.trait:bead:type) beads, that attach to leaf and disk both with interconnecting \$(this.trait:material) pins.\} \{? \| \$(this.trait:gempieces:material) \| Inset with the tiniest of \$(this.trait:gempieces:color) \$(this.trait:gempieces:material) melee gems, each leaf glimmers as if adorned with so many dewdrops.\}
